alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 17 at 10:24PM EST until February 18 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Northern St. Lawrence, Northern Franklin and Southwestern St. Lawrence Counties in New York. * WHEN...Through 1 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. The hazardous conditions are likely for the Friday morning commute. Isolated power outages possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of snow, sleet, and freezing will continue across the Saint Lawrence Valley and be moderate to heavy at times during the early morning hours on Friday. The highest snow amounts will be in and around the Massena area.
info.instruction: Please allow extra time if travel is necessary. Keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
